    It’s Iron Stache

    20 Feb 2018

    Dan talks to Randy Bryce (@IronStache), the Berniecrat ironworker taking on Paul Ryan, about how he plans to knockout the House Speaker, Scott Walker’s decimation of unions and Foxconn’s con against the people of Wisconsin. Thanks to our supporters at Verso Books and University of California Press. Check out Climate Leviathan: A Political Theory of Our Planetary Future by Geoff Mann and Joel Wainwright and Healing from Hate: How Young Men Get Into—and Out of—Violent Extremism by Michael Kimmel Support us with your cash at patreon.com/TheDig

     

    Topics: Electoral Politics US Politics Organizing Labor Movement
    Guests: Randy Bryce
